items.name: N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY
items.notes: Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32

items.name: N8N_USER_MANAGEMENT_JWT_SECRET
items.notes: Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32

items.name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
items.notes: Strong password for PostgreSQL database. Avoid special characters like '@' that can cause connection issues.

items.name: JWT_SECRET
items.notes: At least 32 characters long. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32

items.name: ANON_KEY
items.notes: Generate using Supabase JWT generator: https://supabase.com/docs/guides/self-hosting/docker#generate-api-keys

items.name: SERVICE_ROLE_KEY
items.notes: Generate using Supabase JWT generator: https://supabase.com/docs/guides/self-hosting/docker#generate-api-keys

items.name: DASHBOARD_USERNAME
items.notes: Username for Supabase dashboard access

items.name: DASHBOARD_PASSWORD
items.notes: Strong password for Supabase dashboard access

items.name: POOLER_TENANT_ID
items.notes: Any numeric value, for example: 1000

items.name: NEO4J_AUTH
items.notes: Format: username/password (e.g., neo4j/strongpassword)

items.name: CLICKHOUSE_PASSWORD
items.notes: Strong password for ClickHouse. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32

items.name: MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD
items.notes: Strong password for MinIO. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32

items.name: LANGFUSE_SALT
items.notes: Random string for hashing. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32

items.name: NEXTAUTH_SECRET
items.notes: Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32

items.name: ENCRYPTION_KEY
items.notes: Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32

items.name: SECRET_KEY_BASE
items.notes: Optional: Base key for encryption. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32

items.name: VAULT_ENC_KEY
items.notes: Optional: 32-character encryption key. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32

items.name: N8N_HOSTNAME
items.notes: Optional: Domain for n8n in production (e.g., n8n.yourdomain.com)

items.name: WEBUI_HOSTNAME
items.notes: Optional: Domain for Open WebUI in production (e.g., openwebui.yourdomain.com)

items.name: FLOWISE_HOSTNAME
items.notes: Optional: Domain for Flowise in production (e.g., flowise.yourdomain.com)

items.name: SUPABASE_HOSTNAME
items.notes: Optional: Domain for Supabase in production (e.g., supabase.yourdomain.com)

items.name: OLLAMA_HOSTNAME
items.notes: Optional: Domain for Ollama in production (e.g., ollama.yourdomain.com)

items.name: SEARXNG_HOSTNAME
items.notes: Optional: Domain for SearXNG in production (e.g., searxng.yourdomain.com)

items.name: NEO4J_HOSTNAME
items.notes: Optional: Domain for Neo4j in production (e.g., neo4j.yourdomain.com)

items.name: LETSENCRYPT_EMAIL
items.notes: Optional: Email for Let's Encrypt SSL certificates
